nodes.val: color1 =  Find a black square with a non-black square on its upper and left sides, and record the color of the non-black square (input_grid)
color2 =  Find a black square with a non-black square on its upper and right sides, and record the color of the non-black square (input_grid)
color3 =  Find a black square with a non-black square on its lower and left sides, and record the color of the non-black square (input_grid)
color4 =  Find a black square with a non-black square on its lower and right sides, and record the color of the non-black square (input_grid)
output_grid =  Change the input points to the input color(output_grid, color1, [(0, 0), (0, 1), (1, 0)])
output_grid =  Change the input points to the input color(output_grid, color2, [(0, 2), (0, 3), (1, 3)])
output_grid =  Change the input points to the input color(output_grid, color3, [(2, 0), (3, 0), (3, 1)])
output_grid =  Change the input points to the input color(output_grid, color4, [(2, 3), (3, 2), (3, 3)])
